title: Have chsh work properly
body: I like to use an alternate shell, in this case ksh93. chsh thinks it works, and changes /etc/password for my userid, but when I leave bash and re-enter the shell that's started is still bash, and .bashrc is run. Instead ubuntu should invoke ksh through my .kshrc file. I haven't tried any other alternate shells, but my guess is the same thing will happen.
